name: Recipe for Success Tee
description: The recipe for success tee is inspired by a post on the J. Benjamin Clothing Co. blog titled, 6 Not-So-Secret Tools to Success. These tools or "ingredients" are easy to find and accessible to everyone but the "baker" must be able to put in the necessary work in order to achieve whatever it is that YOU consider success. Money. Happiness. Wealth. Health. That's all up to you but the question is do you have the drive to be successful? Here's the ingredients. Start creating! All tee's are printed on American Apparel Fine Cotton Jersey. 100% manufactured and printed in the USA. Recommended care method: wash inside out in cold water then hang dry. Mens Size Chart Womens Size Chart *Womens shirts are fitted

name: 2010 J. Benjamin Baseball Tee
description: What does baseball have to do with the core of J. Benjamin Clothing Co.? For starters , baseball is a HUGE passion of mine. I love watching baseball as I follow my favorite team very closely. I get very into the games because I believe that a championship team shouldn't lose much. Secondly, the colorway of this tee is the same colors used for the championship gear made for the Yankees. A champion is the epitome of success. Hard work, dedication, and belief in oneself are all qualities that J. Benjamin Clothing Co. strives for and what this t-shirt stands for. Wanna resemble a champion? Then order one of the limited J. Benjamin baseball tee's today! All tee's are printed on American Apparel Fine Cotton Jersey. 100% manufactured and printed in the USA. ***Shirt is heather gray*** Recommended care method: wash inside out in cold water then hang dry. Mens Size Chart Womens Size Chart *Womens shirts are fitted

name: Follow Your Own Dream Tee
description: Here at J. Benjamin Clothing Co. we believe that pursuing your life's and hearts dreams never has a deadline. No matter how old you are, what others may say or think, we believe that if you believe in yourself that everything will fall into place. Faith, work, and dedication will open the doors to following your own dream. We at J. Benjamin Clothing believe that Jackie Robinson is the pinnacle of following ones dream. We hope that if you haven't yet that you begin to following where your heart keeps telling you to go towards. All tee's are printed on American Apparel Unisex Fine Cotton Jersey. 100% manufactured and printed in the USA. Recommended care method: wash inside out in cold water then hang dry. Mens Size Chart

name: I Follow My Own Dream Fat Bracelet
description:
These "fatter" or wider than normal bracelets are now available to let the world know that you are or are intending to follow your own dream.  

Our intention with these bracelets is for the them to be a daily reminder for the wearer to make some attempt towards their dreams, passions, and/or goals.  Each time you look at it, whether you are at your desk or studying for your next test, you are reminded that you are either taking the necessary steps towards your dream or you need to begin to do so.  

Are you following your OWN dream or do you need to get started? 

These bracelets are dark gray with orange lettering.  "I Follow My Own Dream" is printed on the top and the "JB" logo on the bottom.  The bracelet measure 7 3/8" around.
